Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 67th overall pick, by Colorado in 2008...
Injured on 8/8/2008 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 8/16/2012 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 4/11/2013...
Had first career hit on 5/17/2013, off Joe Blanton (ATL)...
Traded from Colorado to Washington on 4/1/2016 (Going to COL: 2B Z. Alberti. Going to WSH: P B. Huggins, P P. Johnson, CF M. Taylor, P R. Blackmer)...
Injured on 7/1/2016 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/6/2018 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/20/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/4/2019 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/11/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 9/3/2022 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Baltimore to Cleveland on 2/10/2023 (Going to BAL: LF W. Gonzalez. Going to CLE: 3B R. Pena, P B. Huggins)...
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 2/1/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $1,780,000 per year...
Released by Milwaukee on 6/17/2024...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 6/17/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $4,592,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/4/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
